posts.post_content: Looking to pick up a couple of these soon.  Send me a scan/$ of what you have.  I need all the Pirates except: Flynn, Camnitz, Miller. I have 2 Phillies and Cubs SGC commons in 1.5 Fair that I might be willing to trade and also a Sporting Life Doolin in SCG VG 3.  Also, I can just pay straight cash. Thanks, Pat
